get selection (Finder).body: tell application "Finder" to return POSIX path of (selection as alias)

browser URL.body: tell application "Brave Browser" to set currentTabUrl to URL of active tab of front window

keystroke.body: tell application "System Events" to keystroke "${1:key}" using {${2:command} down}

key code.body: tell application "System Events" to key code ${1:num} using {${2:command} down}

browser tab title.body: tell application "Brave Browser" to set currentTabName to title of active tab of front window

body: tell application "System Events" to tell process "${1:process}"
click menu item "${2:item}" of menu "${3:menu}" of menu bar 1
tell application "System Events" to tell process "${1:process}"
click menu item "${2:item}" of menu of menu item "${3:submenu}" of menu "${4:menu}" of menu bar 1
set AppleScript's text item delimiters to "~/"
set theTextItems to every text item of unresolved_path
set AppleScript's text item delimiters to (POSIX path of (path to home folder as string))
set resolved_path to theTextItems as string
